description.zh: Wiki.js 是一个基于 Node.js 的现代化、轻量级且功能强大的维基应用。它旨在为创建和管理协作式文档提供简单高效的平台。该项目为开源，由一群赞助商和贡献者积极维护和支持。
description.en: Wiki.js is a modern, lightweight and powerful wiki application built on Node.js. It is designed to provide a simple yet efficient platform for creating and managing collaborative documentation. The app is open-source and supported by a vibrant community of sponsors and contributors.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 开源项目，拥有活跃的社区支持
- 轻量化设计，性能高效
- 基于现代技术栈（Node.js）

## 功能列表:

- 支持协作式文档的创建与管理
- 提供简易的安装与部署选项
- 支持 Docker 及多个托管平台集成
- 可自定义主题及本地化语言支持
- 持续开发与定期版本更新
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source with active community support
- Lightweight and efficient performance
- Modern technology stack (Node.js-based)

## Features:

- Collaborative documentation creation and management
- Easy installation and deployment options
- Integration with Docker and multiple hosting platforms
- Customizable themes and localization support
- Active development and regular updates
